clinical_study.brief_title: Anti-VEGF Instead of Intraoperative PRP in Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy
clinical_study.official_title: Feasibility Study of Anti-VEGF Instead of Intraoperative PRP in Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of vitreoretinal surgery combined with anti-VEGF therapy in the replacement of intraoperative PRP in PDR therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in best-corrected visual acuity (BCVA)
